title: Hole (Courtney Love) - Courtney Act (1990-93 Unreleased SBD)
description:
Hole - Courtney Act (1993 CD Bootleg) [1990 - 1993, Live & In Studio, Unreleased HQ SBD]


Rock Star Uncivil Unrest In The Court Of Her Most Loud Love Majesty!


...Featuring officially unreleased, steller highlights from the 1993 Phoenix Festival & from Maida Vale 1993.

[All tracks officially unreleased at the time of boot's release; still more than half are unleashed]
___________________________________________________________________________________


Hole - Courtney Act
Label: Pseudo Indie Label Ã¢â‚¬â€œ PIL07
Format: CD, Unofficial Release 
Country: Belgium
Released: 1993
Genre: Rock
Style: Alternative Rock, Grunge


CDR c/o Reverberation Music 
(Clean) Silver CD > (my) CDR > EAC > FLAC > you
[Tested OK by EAC & par m'oreilles]


Ample sound samples linked below 
[I give you plenty because I want more]

02	Credit In The Straight World	
03	Teenage Whore

{Tracks still officially unreleased: 1 - 7, 9 - 11, 22, 23} 


Notes
1-5 Phoenix Festival, Stratford-upon-Avon, 16/7/93 [SBD]
6-11 Studio Sessions, Maida Vale, London, 3/93
12 Studio, 3/92
13-16 John Peel Session, BBC Radio, 11/91 (First broadcast on 5/1/92)
17-18 Studio, Seattle, 10/90 
19-21 Studio, Los Angeles, 3/90 
22 Live in Boston, 11/91 [7/11/91, The Rat - AUD]
23 Live in London, 7/93 [15/7/93, Clapham Grand - AUD]


Covers
2 - Young Marble Giants (1980)
4 - Echo & The Bunnymen (1980)
8 - The Raincoats (1979)
12 - The Wipers (1983)
14 - Beat Happening (1991) / The Germs (1977)
22 - Lead Belly (1940s) (song aka In the Pines and Black Girl] 
12 - Unrest (1991) [song aka Yes, She Is My Skinhead Girl] 
+
5 - Nirvana (1993) [song debuted by Hole @ Bizarre Festival, St. Goarshausen, Germany, 10/7/93 / not played live by Nirvana until 6/8/93 / officially released when In Utero dropped 19/9/93]

his own reel-time investigating & testing


...The 20th Anniversary of Hole's classic 1994 album, 'Live Through This,' will be celebrated even if I have to just do it myself...


To Courtney Love, 
My Beautiful Mom! 

"Do It For The Kids Some More." 

(This Is Only My) Love, 
2014 August First (Burst We Must), 
@ The Pirate Bay around thewaymouth 

Make me real, make me tick, 
Make me keep on kicking you.
